verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

\w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* families, saying, “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w*, \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w sacrificing|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Him|strong="H5973"\w* \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Esar-haddon \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria, \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H7605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* replied, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w part|strong="H7218"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* alone \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* land \w set|strong="H1129"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* discourage \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* afraid \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w counselors|strong="H3289"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w frustrate|strong="H6565"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w plans|strong="H6098"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*. Opposition under Xerxes and Artaxerxes

\w At|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Xerxes,\f + \fr 4:6 \ft Hebrew Ahasuerus\f* \w an|strong="H3427"\w* \w accusation|strong="H7855"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* lodged \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w Bishlam|strong="H1312"\w*, \w Mithredath|strong="H4990"\w*, \w Tabeel|strong="H2870"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* associates \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w letter|strong="H5406"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Artaxerxes. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Aramaic \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w then|strong="H4428"\w* \w translated|strong="H8638"\w*.\f + \fr 4:7 \ft The original text of Ezra 4:8 through Ezra 6:18 is in Aramaic.\f*

\w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w commander|strong="H1169"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* letter \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Artaxerxes as \w follows|strong="H3660"\w*:

\w From|strong="H1768"\w* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w commander|strong="H1169"\w*, \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, \w and|strong="H5613"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* their associates—\w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w judges|strong="H1784"\w* \w and|strong="H5613"\w* \w officials|strong="H2967"\w* over Tripolis, Persia, Erech \w and|strong="H5613"\w* Babylon, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Elamites|strong="H5962"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7801"\w*,

\w and|strong="H7229"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* peoples \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w and|strong="H7229"\w* \w honorable|strong="H3358"\w* Ashurbanipal \f + \fr 4:10 \ft Aramaic Osnappar, another name for Ashurbanipal\f* \w deported|strong="H1541"\w* \w and|strong="H7229"\w* \w settled|strong="H3488"\w* \w in|strong="H3488"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w cities|strong="H7149"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w* \w and|strong="H7229"\w* elsewhere west \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Euphrates.\f + \fr 4:10 \ft Aramaic beyond the River; also in verses 11, 16, 17, and 20\f*

(\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* text \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* letter \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.) \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Artaxerxes, \w From|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w*, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* men west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Euphrates:

Let \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H5559"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w us|strong="H5922"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* returned \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilding|strong="H1124"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4779"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* wicked \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, restoring \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w repairing|strong="H2338"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* foundations.

\w Let|strong="H3705"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* restored, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w pay|strong="H5415"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w*, duty, \w or|strong="H2006"\w* \w toll|strong="H1983"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* treasury \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w suffer|strong="H5142"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w service|strong="H4415"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w* \f + \fr 4:14 \ft Literally because the salt of the palace is the salt we eat\f* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* fitting \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w us|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* allow \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* dishonored, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w inform|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*

\w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H7149"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w record|strong="H1799"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* fathers. \w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w discover|strong="H7912"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* verify \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4779"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, harmful \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w*, inciting sedition \w from|strong="H4481"\w* ancient times. \w That|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* why \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2718"\w*.

\w We|strong="H1768"\w* advise \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* restored, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* dominion west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Euphrates. The Decree of Artaxerxes

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* reply: \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w commander|strong="H1169"\w*, \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* associates living \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* elsewhere \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Euphrates: Greetings.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w us|strong="H5922"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* been \w translated|strong="H6568"\w* \w and|strong="H7972"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w my|strong="H5922"\w* \w presence|strong="H6925"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w issued|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w conducted|strong="H1240"\w*. \w It|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w discovered|strong="H7912"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* revolted \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* ancient times, engaging \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H4776"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* sedition.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w mighty|strong="H8624"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w ruled|strong="H7990"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* exercised \w authority|strong="H7990"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w whole|strong="H3606"\w* \w region|strong="H5675"\w* west \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Euphrates; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w*, duty, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w toll|strong="H1983"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w paid|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H4481"\w*, \w issue|strong="H7761"\w* \w an|strong="H5705"\w* \w order|strong="H5705"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w these|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* stop, \w so|strong="H5705"\w* \w that|strong="H2942"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* will \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1124"\w* \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w so|strong="H5705"\w* \w order|strong="H5705"\w*.

See \w that|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* not \w neglect|strong="H7960"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H1836"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4101"\w* allow \w this|strong="H1836"\w* threat \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w increase|strong="H7680"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* interests \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w suffer|strong="H5142"\w*?

\w When|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* text \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Artaxerxes \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w*, \w Shimshai|strong="H8124"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* their associates, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w went|strong="H5613"\w* immediately \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* forcibly stopped \w them|strong="H1994"\w*.

Thus \w the|strong="H1768"\w* construction \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* God \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w ceased|strong="H1934"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H1934"\w* remained \w at|strong="H5705"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* standstill \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w second|strong="H8648"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.
